external_games.name: Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition
Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition

name: Puzzle & Dragons: Super Mario Bros. Edition
summary: In Puzzle & Dragons Super Mario Bros. Edition, you get to travel to different worlds as you assemble a team of Mushroom Kingdom baddies, like Goombas or Koopa Troopas, and recruit much-loved Mario characters, including Toad and Yoshi!
